naslov: LUKSUZNA VILA NA OSAMI I PANORAMSKIM POGLEDOM NA ZADAR (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se ekskluzivna vila, izgrađena i opremljena 2025. godine, smještena na mirnom brdu u Preku, na otoku Ugljanu, s prekrasnim panoramskim pogledom na zadarski arhipelag. Ova luksuzna nekretnina pruža savršenu privatnost i potpuni mir, idealna za one koji žele uživati u prirodi i luksuzu. Vila je građena s vrhunskim materijalima i opremljena je svim modernim pogodnostima: grijani bazen za opuštanje u svim godišnjim dobima sauna i jacuzzi za potpunu relaksaciju prostrana terasa s roštiljem, idealna za druženja i uživanje u pogledu dječje igralište za najmlađe članove obitelji podno grijanje i dizalice topline za maksimalnu energetsku učinkovitost klimatizacijski sustav u cijeloj vili za ugodnu klimu tijekom ljeta 4 prostrane spavaće sobe i velik dnevni boravak savršen za obiteljski život 5 parkirnih mjesta osiguravaju udoban smještaj za Vaše goste Ova vila je spoj modernog dizajna, funkcionalnosti i prirodne ljepote. Idealna je za obiteljski život, ali i kao luksuzna investicija ili kuća za odmor. Za više informacija i dogovor oko razgledavanja, slobodno nas kontaktirajte! CIJENA NA UPIT ! KONTAKT : +385 91 9343 658 Za više informacija i fotografija o vili posjetite web : asterion-realestate.hr ENG ___________________________________________________________ For sale: Exclusive, modern villa built and fully equipped in 2025, located on a peaceful hilltop in Preko on Ugljan Island, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the Zadar archipelago and the Adriatic Sea. This luxury property provides complete privacy, ideal for a relaxing family home, vacation retreat, or premium real estate investment. Constructed with top-quality materials and equipped with high-end features for maximum comfort and energy efficiency, the villa includes: Heated swimming pool for year-round enjoyment Private sauna and jacuzzi (hot tub) for total wellness and relaxation Spacious terrace with BBQ area, perfect for outdoor gatherings and sunset views Children's playground for safe and fun family moments Underfloor heating and heat pumps for energy-efficient climate control Full air conditioning system throughout the villa 4 spacious bedrooms and a large open-plan living room 5 private parking spaces for guests and owners Surrounded by nature, with no neighbors nearby – absolute peace and quiet Located on the beautiful island of Ugljan, just a short distance from Zadar, this villa combines the best of natural surroundings and modern luxury living by the sea. A perfect choice for those seeking a peaceful oasis, a stylish second home, or a profitable investment in high-end property. For more information or to schedule a viewing, feel free to contact us. PRICE ON DEMAND !
